snippet: More than 4,000 parents and relatives of children who attend a school where a 6-year-old girl was raped in Bangalore, India, demanded that the police arrest those involved.
lead_paragraph: More than 4,000 parents and relatives of children who attend a school where a 6-year-old girl was raped in Bangalore, India, demanded that the police arrest those involved.

headline.main: Thousands in India Demand Justice for Girl, 6, Who Was Raped at School
headline.print_headline: Thousands in India Demand Justice for Girl, 6, Who Was Raped at School
